This report investigates the reproducibility of the paper ‘Interpretable Complex-Valued Neural Networks For Privacy Protection’ by Xiang et al. (2020). The paper proposes a new method of creating complex-valued DNNs, for which the privacy of the model is better protected against potential attackers while the performance of the models is largely preserved.
